contents.text: Thank you for calling Remix in San Francisco, the platform for designing your city’s transportation future.
For sales and government partnership inquiries, press 1.
To schedule a personalized demo of the Remix platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a product specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a personalized demo of Remix’s transportation planning tools.
Schedule a product demo of Remix’s planning tools for a veterans’ nonprofit I’m involved with
Schedule a deep dive demo of Remix’s network analysis and scenario modeling features
I need help setting up a time for a guided walkthrough of the Remix platform.
I’d like to schedule a personalized walkthrough of Remix to evaluate its features for my urban transport modeling project.

contents.text: To discuss government and transit agency partnerships, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I want to discuss forming a government or transit agency partnership with Remix.
Learn how to set up a partnership between my city’s transit agency and our veteran support program
Discuss forming a transit agency partnership for API integration and data sharing
I’d like to discuss partnering my city’s transit agency with Remix.
I’m coordinating a city transit research project at my university and want to explore a partnership with Remix.

contents.text: For technical support and account services, press 2.
For technical support with our transportation planning platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m having trouble with the planning platform and need technical support.
Get help troubleshooting an error I’m seeing in the Remix transportation planning platform
Troubleshoot an error in the route optimization algorithm within the planning platform
I’m having trouble getting the planning tool to load and need technical assistance.
I’m encountering an error importing GIS data into the platform and need technical support.

contents.text: For account questions or billing assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we direct you to our account services team.

navigationGoals: I have a billing question about my Remix account.
Update my billing information and clarify recent charges on my Remix account
Clarify our usage-based pricing metrics and resolve a billing discrepancy
I have a question about my billing statement and need help with my account.
I need clarification on my Remix subscription invoice and assistance with billing options.
